description:
Fans of the Hostel franchise will be excited to know that the Lionsgate brand is now headed to television. A Hostel TV series is officially in the works. And, while not many details were revealed beyond that, it was shared that none other than Paul Giamatti is attached. The fan-favorite actor recently earned a Golden [...]

The post Paul Giamatti To Star In ‘Hostel’ TV Series From Eli Roth appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Paul Giamatti To Star In ‘Hostel’ TV Series From Eli Roth

description:
The upcoming horror film Alien: Romulus looks like a fitting return to the early years of the Alien film series. In fact, as shown in the newly-released trailer, Alien: Romulus looks like an excellent blend of both Alien and Aliens that’s sure to get fans excited. Interestingly, Romulus actually takes place in between the events [...]

The post ‘Alien: Romulus’ New Trailer Released appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Alien: Romulus’ New Trailer Released
